alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Kent; Queen Anne's (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 6:26PM EDT until July 18 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR QUEEN ANNE`S...NORTHEASTERN CAROLINE AND CENTRAL KENT COUNTIES... At 626 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Massey to Old Town, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Centerville, Chestertown, Centreville, Oakland, Church Hill, Millington, Sudlersville, Goldsboro, Sassafras, Old Town, Langford, Overton, Starkey Corner, Morgnec, Massey, Crumpton, Carville, Hope, Galena and Henderson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
